com.kuka.device

Interface IMovableDevice

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SunriseMovableDevice

    public interface IMovableDevice
    Provides information about the state of device that is able move.

    If the ready to move state changes a notification is sent to the registered listeners.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addIsReadyToMoveListener(IMovableDeviceStateListener isReadyToMoveListener)
      Adds a listener to be notified on ready to move changes.
      boolean areDrivesReady()
      Indicates that the drives are ready and not signaling an error.
      boolean hasActiveMotionCommand()
      Returns true if the device is currently executing a motion command for example by jogging or running an application.
      boolean isReadyToMove()
      A IMovableDevice is ready to move if a movement command can be executed.
      void removeIsReadyToMoveListener(IMovableDeviceStateListener isReadyToMoveListener)
      Removes a listener to no longer be notified on ready to move changes.

    • Method Detail

      • isReadyToMove

        boolean isReadyToMove()
        A IMovableDevice is ready to move if a movement command can be executed.

        For a general robot this method returns true if the SafetyStopType is SafetyStopType.NOSTOP and the drives are ready.

        To be notified about changes of this state, use addIsReadyToMoveListener(com.kuka.device.IMovableDeviceStateListener).

        Returns:
        true, if the device is ready to move at this moment:
      • the SafetyStopType is SafetyStopType.NOSTOP,
      • AND the drives are ready (they are not in an error state).
        • false, otherwise

      • addIsReadyToMoveListener

        void addIsReadyToMoveListener(IMovableDeviceStateListener isReadyToMoveListener)
        Adds a listener to be notified on ready to move changes.
        Parameters:
        isReadyToMoveListener - the listener

      • removeIsReadyToMoveListener

        void removeIsReadyToMoveListener(IMovableDeviceStateListener isReadyToMoveListener)
        Removes a listener to no longer be notified on ready to move changes.
        Parameters:
        isReadyToMoveListener - the listener

      • areDrivesReady

        boolean areDrivesReady()
        Indicates that the drives are ready and not signaling an error.
        Returns:
        true if the drives of the device are ready and not signaling an error.

      • hasActiveMotionCommand

        boolean hasActiveMotionCommand()
        Returns true if the device is currently executing a motion command for example by jogging or running an application. This includes PositionHold.
        Returns:
        true if this device is currently executing a motion command
